label: 大村益次郎
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
見出し読み: おおむら ますじろ
説明文: (1824-69). Earlier: MURATA. Son of Choshu fief doctor. Student of Western military science; adviser to Date Muneki of Uwajima. Returned to Choshu, 1856; carried out military reforms; made hirazamurai. Post in war ministry after Restoration. Assassinated late 1869.
